shortdesc.ph: Registers an observer for encoded audio data.
Registers an observer for encoded audio data.

p.codeblock: virtual int registerAudioEncodedFrameObserver(const AudioEncodedFrameObserverConfig& config, IAudioEncodedFrameObserver *observer) = 0;
public abstract int registerAudioEncodedFrameObserver(AudioEncodedFrameObserverConfig config, IAudioEncodedFrameObserver observer);

section.note: You need to call this method after joining a channel. You can call this method or startAudioRecording to set the recording type and quality of the audio file, but Agora does not recommend using both methods at the same time. Only the method called later takes effect.

Call this method after joining a channel. You can use this method or startAudioRecording to configure the recording type and quality of the audio file, but using both is not recommended. Only the method called last takes effect.
